channel.title: NextDraft on Paul Cutler
channel.description: Recent content in NextDraft on Paul Cutler

item.title: Are you reading NextDraft? If not, you should be.
item.description: Are you reading NextDraft? If you’re not, you should be. Dave Pell curates the top 10 news items of the day, just for you, delivered straight to your inbox. Yup, it’s delivered via email, quite old school. Mr. Pell spends each morning for 3-4 hours browsing the web (no RSS reader for him!) and puts together the best stories to share and adds his own unique commentary to each of them.
